html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06762023-06-23ECCC
ActCanada Wildlife Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Purchase, Lease, Acquisition, and Disposal of Lands and an Agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2022-828 of June 24, 2022; (2) approving that the Minister of the Environment enter into an agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories; (3) authorizing the Minister of the Environment to lease any lands, or purchase or acquire any lands or any interests or rights, in any lands, in an amount that does not exceed a total of up to 28.7 million dollars until March 31, 2026; and (4) authorizing the Minister of the Environment to dispose of lands within the Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area and lands within 10 metres of the eastern boundary of the Big Creek National Wildlife Area.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Purchase, Lease, Acquisition, and Disposal of Lands and an Agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories
precis: Order (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2022-828 of June 24, 2022; (2) approving that the Minister of the Environment enter into an agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories; (3) authorizing the Minister of the Environment to lease any lands, or purchase or acquire any lands or any interests or rights, in any lands, in an amount that does not exceed a total of up to 28.7 million dollars until March 31, 2026; and (4) authorizing the Minister of the Environment to dispose of lands within the Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area and lands within 10 metres of the eastern boundary of the Big Creek National Wildlife Area.
